actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 415 of the Communications Act of 1934, as amended, to provide for a 2-year period of limitations in proceedings against carriers for the recovery of overcharges or damages not based on overcharges.

summary.text: Provides for a two-year period of limitations under the Federal Communications Act in proceedings against carriers for the recovery of overcharges or damages not based on overcharges. (Amends 47 U.S.C. 415)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 415 of the Communications Act of 1934, as amended, to provide for a 2-year period of limitations in proceedings against carriers for the recovery of overcharges or damages not based on overcharges.
